SELECT statu.`orderStatus_id` AS orderStatusId, statu.`orderStatus_name` AS orderStatusName, SUM(comm1.`number`) AS number
FROM `tb_orderstatus` statu LEFT JOIN (SELECT comm.orderstatus_id,comm.number FROM tb_commodity comm WHERE comm.order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM tb_order WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM tb_user WHERE user_id =#{userId}))) AS comm1
ON statu.`orderStatus_id`=comm1.`orderstatus_id` WHERE statu.`orderStatus_id` IN (1,2,3,9) GROUP BY statu.`orderStatus_id`
